nodes.title: DevOps
nodes.subTitle: 如果您想更快地构建更好的软件，DevOps 就是答案。Websoft9 平台提供了开发、构建、交付和监控全生命周期的工具，助力您向 DevOps 转变

nodes.title: Automation
nodes.subTitle: 智能的自动化技术用于执行人类重复性办公任务，而是实现降低成本，解放生产力的目标。Websoft9 平台和应用提供了常见的自动化技术手段，包括业务流程化、应用集成自动化等工具，实现业务全场景的自动化需求。

overview.overview: Huginn is a system for building agents that perform automated tasks for you online. They can read the web, watch for events, and take actions on your behalf.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Think of it as a hackable version of IFTTT or Zapier on your own server
